targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(timestamp,$__interval,NULL),
  cpuSys AS metric,
  deviceName AS "deviceName"
FROM ATVstats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND
  deviceName IN ($ATV) AND
  RPL = $RPL
-- GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(timestamp,$__interval,NULL)
